pageProps.content:
At Africa Unwind, we custom-design luxury holidays to Africa – so each itinerary is tailored to perfection to suit each client’s individual needs.

However, we thought we’ll share some of our favourite trips with you so that you can get a better idea of what a bespoke Africa Unwind vacation looks like.

Our trips are categorized as follow: Charming, Stylish & Exclusive.

Our Charming Trips offer superb value for money - without compromising on the experience, while our Stylish Trips are ideal for the luxury traveller who prefer stylish interiors & fantastic experiences. The Crème de la Crème at Africa Unwind is our Exclusive Trips that are best suited for the discerning traveller who requires high-end lodges, exclusivity & world-class service.

Before we can create a suggested itinerary for you, we’ll need an estimate budget - the starting place from which we plan all vacations.

Please journey with us as we share some of our favourite trips below. What are you waiting for?

RATE

USD $ 12,000 + per person

subfolders.title: Creme De La Creme
subfolders.description: Experience Botswana & Vic Falls’ premier lodges • Stay in luxury – spacious suites, private pools & outdoor showers • Encounter Africa’s predators during day & night drives • Enjoy river views & romantic sunset boat cruises • Witness the majestic Victoria Falls • Swim at the edge of the Falls – season dependent

subfolders.title: Pride Of Africa
subfolders.description: Experience stylish penthouse living in Cape Town • Enjoy spectacular views of Table Mountain from your rooftop deck • See the bush from a bird’s eye view – luxurious small plane transfers • Stay in South Africa’s very best:  Singita lodges • Get up, close & person with Africa’s famous Big 5 • Witness the majestic Victoria Falls

subfolders.title: Royal Rwanda
subfolders.description: Trek through the forest in search of mountain gorillas • Enjoy Big 5 game viewing • Go on thrilling game drives, guided walks, night drives & boating safaris • Experience one of the world’s best birding areas:  over 500 recorded species • Stay in luxury • Enjoy a boutique-style safari experience

subfolders.title: Tanzania Bush & Beach
subfolders.description: Witness the Great Wildebeest Migration (July – October) • Taste Tanzania’s best coffee • Spot the iconic tree-climbing lions of Lake Manyara • Sleep in luxury treehouse suites • Experience excellent Big 5 wildlife viewing year-round • Enjoy water activities on a private island

subfolders.title: Namibia With Wings
subfolders.description: Experience Namibia’s most remote regions from the air • Take a scenic hot air balloon flight over SossusvleiStay in luxury – private pools & outdoor showers • Enjoy spectacular desert views & special activities • Go on thrilling Big 5 game drives year-round • See frequent sightings of black & white rhino

subfolders.title: Elite Bush & Beach Fushion
subfolders.description: Experience the best of bush & beach • Tick off the Big 5 on safari • Stay in luxury – river & ocean views, private pools & butlers • Go off-road driving & search for nocturnal animals • Enjoy water activities, spa treatments & castaway island picnics • Feel like royalty in private helicopter transfers
